description: This file is a React hook named `useRealTime` that manages real-time presence and broadcasting functionality using Supabase. It handles connection state, presence tracking, receiving broadcast signals, and providing an API for components to interact with real-time features in a classroom or collaborative environment.

methods.name: useRealTime({ roomId, onSignal, userId })
methods.description: A React hook that manages real-time presence and signaling for a classroom room using Supabase channels, providing status, participant info, error handling, and signal broadcasting functionalities.

methods.name: sendSignal
methods.description: Function to send a broadcast signal through the Supabase channel, returning success status.
